page.title: 04CATHERINE WARD HALL
page.content: The Catherine Ward Hall was opened in January 1970 as sheltered accommodation for old people.There is a resident warden in attendance.This lady has been working here for eight and a half years. There are 28 men and women living here at present.They each have their own flat fitted with a kitchen, where they may cook their own meals.Those unable to prepare their own food have meals cooked for them. There is a large Day Room/Lounge area where the old people may meet and talk during the day.This room is used for entertainments such as T.V.,bingo and dominoes.The room is equipped with large armchairs and tables. Outings are organised in the summer. Most residents had lived here for at least three years and said they enjoyed it.
